content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I am sorry to say that I am not willing to accept that rental price at this time. I believe that the apartment is worth more than 700 Euros per month, and I am looking for a higher offer. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I can negotiate. What do you have in mind?

I am a student, so I am on a budget, but I am willing to work with you to find a mutually agreeable solution.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Li. I appreciate your flexibility. In that case, I am willing to accept a rental price of 800 Euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price for the apartment, given its size and location. Please let me know if you are willing to accept this price or if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
